name: Empowering Barriers
target: powers that grant buffs and deal damage
description: While you are buffed by the power, your spell hits grant you temp HP and recover 1 spell slot lvl. Additionally, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Shrapnel
description: Whenever the power hits, it shatters into bolts of energy, making spell atks against all foes adj to its target which deal $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Powerful Missiles
description: The power's projs deal more dmg.

name: Close Penetration
description: The power's projs are converted to line areas with length equal to half the proj's range, and deal more dmg.

name: Distant Missiles
description: The power's projs have double range.

name: Rapid Energy
target: powers with a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power's usage time is reduced by 1 step and it deals more dmg, but its cost 1 increased by 1 step.

name: Aggressive Force
description: The power deals more dmg. This bonus is doubled against targets on full HP.

name: Powerful Intensity
description: The power deals massively more dmg, but its usage time is increased by 1 step.

name: Prismatic Power
description: The power deals more dmg of all types other than its base types.

name: Sacrificial Shredding
description: Whenever the power hits, the target gets increased $nonPhysType dmg taken until the end of your next turn.

name: Enduring Persistence
target: powers with a non-instantaneous duration that deal damage
description: If you have an active pers area when you use the power, the power's duration is increased by 1 step, but it deals less dmg.

name: Sacrificial Defence
target: powers with a non-instantaneous duration that cost HP
description: For the power's duration, you have substantially increased $nonPhysType barrier and phys barrier.

name: Enduring Possession
description: At the start of each of your turns during the power's duration, you release a wisp of energy at the nearest foe, regardless of line of sight, that inflicts them with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CHA save.

name: Regular Duplication
target: powers that deal damage and have an effect that triggers once on each of your turns
description: The power's effect triggers again on the opposite side of your turn, but it deals less dmg.

name: Generosity
description: The power can no longer be used on yourself, but can instead be used on any minion of yours within 60' of you.

name: Generous Power
target: powers that apply buffs and deal damage
description: When you use the power to buff one of your minions, the minion also gains barely increased dmg and +1 crit range for the buff's duration. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Sacrificial Eruption
target: powers that apply buffs and deal damage
description: When you use the power to buff one of your minions, the minion is rooted for the buff's duration. When the buff ends, the minion dies and explodes, causing you to make a spell atk against all foes adj to the minion's corpse, dealing substantial $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Enduring Sealing
description: For the power's duration, you have massively increased DoT dmg barrier.

name: Empowered Alacrity
description: Whenever the power's buffs on you end, your sp increases by 5' for the same duration as the buff was on you.

name: Suppressed Power
description: For each round of combat you don't use the power, you are inflicted with a DoT dealing $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CHA save. Whenever you use the power while affected by this DoT, the DoT is removed and the power deals substantially more dmg.

name: Incubating Rejuvenation
description: Whenever you use the power, you heal HP for each round this combat since you last used the power. Additionally, the power deals massively less dmg.

name: Flagellation
description: Whenever the power hits one of your minions, that minion deals substantially more dmg until the end of their next turn.

name: Powerful Cruelty
description: The power deals more dmg against bloodied targets.

name: Empowered Resilience
description: Whenever the power's buffs on you end, you gain dmg barrier for the same duration as the buff was on you.

name: Empowered Leeching
description: While you are buffed by the power, the power's hits heal you for a slight amount of HP.

name: Empowered Decay
description: While buffed by the power and bloodied, your hits inflict a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CON save.

name: Empowered Control
target: powers that apply buffs and deal damage
description: While buffed by the power and bloodied, you gain a massive amount of phys barrier and +1 to saves vs debuffs. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Controlled Sacrifice
description: If you use the power while healthy, your HP drops to your bloodied threshold. Additionally, the power deals more dmg.

name: Empowered Vengeance
target: powers that apply buffs and deal damage
description: If you go down while buffed by the power, you release a wave of energy, a spell atk against all adj foes dealing substantial $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Sacrificial Recovery
target: powers with a non-cooldown resource cost that apply buffs
description: At the start of each of your turns while buffed by the power, you recover 1 unit of the power's cost and lose a slight amount of HP.

name: Powerful Empowerment
description: While buffed by the power and bloodied, you deal more dmg.

name: Empowered Bursting
description: At the start of each of your turns while buffed by the power, you release a wave of energy, making a spell atk against all adj foes that deals $nonPhysType dmg.

name: Keen Duplication
target: powers that deal damage, make attacks, and have an effect that triggers once on each of your turns
description: The power's effect triggers again on the opposite side of your turn and has +1 crit range, but deals substantially less dmg.

name: Shredding Cruelty
description: Whenever the power hits, the target gets increased $nonPhysType dmg taken and -1 to debuff saves until the end of your next turn. Additionally, the power's hits debilitate until the end of the target's next turn and deal substantially less dmg.

name: Delayed Eruption
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is charged with unstable energy, which erupts into an explosion of energy at the start of your next turn, making spell atks against all foes adj to the target that deal $nonPhysType dmg. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Cruel Technique
description: The power has +1 debuff effectiveness and any procs it triggers deal barely more dmg while you are dual-wielding.

name: Incubating Power
description: While the power is on cooldown, scoring a melee hit grants slightly more dmg to your next usage of the power.

name: Mobile Technique
description: At the end of the power's movement, you can immediately use a maneuver with a usage time of 1 action, spending its exertion cost as usual.

name: Incubating Warding
description: While the power is on cooldown, scoring a melee hit grants you a slight amount of temp HP the next time you use the power (stacking to 1 instance).

name: Incubating Atmosphere
description: While the power is on cooldown, scoring a melee hit causes your next usage of the power to project a 5' aura of energy that makes spell atks against foes dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg (dmg stacks into 1 aura).

name: Mobile Magic
description: At the end of the power's movement, you can immediately cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action, spending spell slots as usual.

name: Magic Mobility
description: In the middle of the power's movement, you can immediately cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action, spending spell slots as usual.

name: Erratic Power
target: powers that move you without teleportation
description: The power's movement must now zig-zag, but it deals more dmg.

name: Sluggish Surging
description: At the end of the power's movement, a wave of energy continues in the same direction, making spell atks against foes in a 30' line that deal barely any $nonPhysType dmg and make targets sluggish until the end of your next turn.

name: Staggering Power
description: Whenever the power hits, the target becomes staggered until the end of your next turn. Additionally, the power deals barely more dmg.

name: Mobility
description: The power's max movement distance is doubled.

name: Keen Warding
description: The power has +1 crit range and, whenever it scores a crit, you gain barely any temp HP.

name: Empowerment
description: While you are buffed, the power deals more dmg.

name: Building Empowerment
description: Whenever you use the power, buffs on you have +1 effectiveness until you next lose a buff. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Mobile Substitution
target: powers that move you and deal damage
description: At the end of the power's movement, you can immediately cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action for free. Additionally, the power deals no dmg.

name: Incubating Empowerment
description: Whenever the power hits, buffs on you have +1 effectiveness until you next lose a buff. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Mobile Power
description: If the power displaces you 30+', it deals more dmg.

name: Crippled Power
description: The power deals substantially more dmg, but its max movement distance is halved.

name: Invulnerable Mobility
description: You are immune to dmg during the power's movement.

name: Flexible Mobility
description: You can take other actions midway through the power's movement.

name: Massive Chaining
description: The power can chain 1 additional time.

name: Insulated Power
description: The power deals massively more dmg, but no longer chains.

name: Duplicating Rifts
description: Whenever you use the power, an energy rift is opened at the its centre-point. At the start of your next turn, this rift will use the power centred on itself again before disappearing.

name: Persistence
description: When the power's pers area ends, it ticks 1 more time.

name: Contagion
description: At the start of your next turn after using the power, its DoT spreads to all foes adj to its victims. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Spreading
target: powers with areas that grow each round
description: The power's area grows further each round.

name: Immediate Power
description: The power deals massive additional $nonPhysType dmg when it succeeds at affecting its target, but deals substantially less DoT dmg.

name: Slowing
description: Whenever the power hits, the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

name: Empowering Strikes
description: Whenever you use the power, your next melee power deals more dmg against debuffed targets.

name: Merciful Alacrity
description: The power no longer applies debuffs, but instead for the duration the debuffs would have, you have +50' sp.

name: Immediate Decay
description: Whenever the power hits a DoT'd target, the DoT ticks (including its exit conditions) infinitely until it is removed. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Empowering Decay
description: Whenever you use the power, you gain increased DoT dmg and your wep powers have their usage times reduced by 1 step until the end of your next turn. Additionally, the power deals substantially less dmg.

name: Empowered Erosion
description: Whenever you hit while buffed by the power, the target is inflicted with a DoT dealing slight $nonPhysType dmg, stacking until CHA save.

name: Enduring Shredding
target: powers that deal damage and apply debuffs which can be consumed early
description: The power's debuff also gives the target slightly increased $physType dmg taken, and the debuff can no longer be consumed early. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Frail Decay
description: The power's DoT is converted into a mark that causes the target to take the DoT's tick whenever they are hit. This still scales as if it were a DoT.

name: Eroding Decay
description: Creatures inflicted by the power's DoT have increased DoT dmg taken.

name: Shredding Affliction
description: Whenever you inflict a creature with the power's DoT, they have slightly increased phys dmg taken until the end of your next turn.

name: Intense Affliction
description: The power's debuffs have +1 effectiveness.

name: Forced Recovery
target: powers with a cooldown and a non-cooldown resource cost
description: The power no longer has a cooldown and deals more dmg, but its cost is increased by 2 steps.

name: Persistent Awakening
description: Whenever you use the power, each allied pers area adj to you ticks. Additionally, the power deals less dmg.

name: Projection [abyssal echoes DONE]
description: The power's self-burst area is converted into a sphere area that you can cast centred on any point you can see within 60' of you.
